text.text: How do I create a collection agency for the first time in the system?

text: To create a collection agency for the first time, you can use the "Move to collections" window. If there are no collection agencies configured in your system, the window will be blank. Enter the name of the collection agency in the "Collection agency" field and click "Confirm". The next time the window displays, the agency you added will be listed.

text.text: Can you guide me through creating a collection agency from the Claim page?

text: To create a collection agency from the Claim page, you must have the "Edit complete claim credits/balance" and "Adjustment posting" permissions. To get to the Claim page, enter the claim number in search and select the number from the Search Results list. If the patient is the payer, click the Credits tab and then click Move to collections.

text.text: What permissions do I need to access the Credits and "Running claim balance" tabs on the Claim page?

text: To access the Credits and "Running claim balance" tabs, you must have the "Edit complete claim credits/balance" permission set for your account. To access the "Adjust balance" button, you must have the "Adjustment posting" permission set.

text.text: How can I create a collection agency if I'm moving only one claim to collections?

text: You can create a collection agency as you move an account or claim to collections. The collection agency will be available from anywhere in the system for future use.

text.text: When creating a collection agency from the Claim page, what do I do after entering the agency name?

text: After entering the agency name, click Confirm to add your first agency. The next time you open the "Move to collections" window, the agency you just added will be listed and available for selection.

text.text: How do I create a collection agency from the Patient Billing page?

text: To create a collection agency from the Patient Billing page, you can use the Move to Collections Agency button on the Patient responsibility tab. The first time you click this button, you will need to enter the collection agency information. Once entered, you will have the option to select that collection agency or create a new one.

text.text: What permission setting must be enabled for my user account to move accounts to collections from the Patient Billing page?

text: To move accounts to collections and to write off bad debt, the Adjustment Posting setting must be enabled for your user account. If it is NOT enabled, you will not see those buttons on the Patient Billing page.

text.text: What steps do I follow to select multiple accounts for moving to collections from the Patient Billing page?

text: To select multiple accounts for moving to collections from the Patient Billing page, you can: 1. Hover over Claims on the navigation bar and select Patient Billing. 2. On the tab you select, scroll down to find the account or enter the patient name in the box under the column heading. 3. On that same line, click the review icon. 4. Click Move to collections.

text.text: After selecting accounts on the Patient Billing page, what is the next step before moving them to collections?

text: To move accounts to collections, you must first click either the Final statement sent or Collection letter sent tab.

text.text: How can I verify that the selected accounts are correct before moving them to collections?

text: To verify that the selected accounts are correct before moving them to collections, you can: 1. Click the Review icon next to the account number. 2. The account details will be displayed. 3. If the account is correct, click Move to collections.

text.text: What options do I have on the Choose Collection Agency window when moving accounts to collections?

text: On the Choose Collection Agency window, you can: - Select a collection agency. - Create a new collection agency.

text.text: If the collection agency is already in the system, how do I select it from the list?

text: To select a collection agency that is already in the system, you can click the radio bullet next to the agency's name.

text.text: What message confirms the successful move of accounts to a collection agency?

text: You will see a message confirming the successful move of the accounts.

text.text: How can I access a list of all accounts currently in collections?

text: You can run the "Accounts in Collections" report to see all accounts currently in collections. This report lists accounts sent to both the collection agency and state debt collections.

text.text: Which report can I run to see accounts sent to both the collection agency and state debt collections?

text: You can run the "Accounts in Collections" report to see all accounts currently in collections. This report lists accounts sent to both the collection agency and state debt collections.

text.text: how can i create a collection agency?

text: To create a collection agency, you can use the "Choose Collection Agency" window. To add a collection agency, enter the name in the "Or, create a new collection agency" field. If the agency is already in the system, it appears on the list. To select it, click the radio bullet next to the agency's name.

text.text: i want to create a collection agency from claim page. what should i do?

text: To create a collection agency from the Claim page, you can use the "Move to collections" window. To access the Credits and "Running claim balance" tabs, you must have the "Edit complete claim credits/balance" permission set for your account. To access the "Adjust balance" button, you must have the "Adjustment posting" permission set.

text.text: from the patient billing how do i create collection agency? explain the complete process.

text: To create a collection agency from the Patient Billing page, you can use the "Move to Collections Agency" button. The first time you click this button, you will need to enter the collection agency information. You can also create a collection agency from the Claim page using the "Move to collections" window.

text.text: Creating a collection agency from Patient Billing

text: To create a collection agency from the Patient Billing page, you can use the "Move to Collections Agency" button. The first time you click this button, you will need to enter the collection agency information. You can also create a collection agency from the Claim page using the "Move to collections" window.

text.text: what details should i fill while creating a collection agency?

text: When you create a collection agency, you need to enter the name of the collection agency in the "Collection agency" field. If there are no collection agencies configured in your system yet, the "Move to collections" window will be blank.

text.text: what information will be sent to collection agency?

text:
The following information will be sent to the collection agency:

* Patient name
* Patient address
* Patient phone number
* Account number
* Claim number
* Amount due
* Date of service
* Insurance information
* Collection agency name
